Michelle Attoh bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme telivishọn na C.E.O
nke ụlọ ọrụ Marketing and Events. A mụrụ ya na Ghana n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Ghana, Rama Brew.
Michelle bụ onye na-achikọta Today's Woman na TV3. Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ndị ọzọ ọ rụrụ n'ọrụ ya bu ndi edepụtara n'okpuru ebe a.
